articles.content: Italian components manufacturer FSA has announced a new 12-speed update to its semi-wireless K-Force WE road groupset. While one could be forgiven for thinking that the WE groupset, first launched fo… [+6599 chars]

articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.title: Chipofy's wattage-metering USB-C cable is on a Prime Day Lightning Deal - The Verge
articles.description: This unique 6.6-foot cable pushes 100W of power, enough for some full-size laptops, and tells you how much it’s delivering. With this cable for just over $15, you can know how much power your devices actually get.
articles.content:
Yes, thats a power meter in this USB-C cable that costs only a bit more than $15 right now.
Photo by Sean Hollister / The Verge
All kinds of stuff are on sale when Amazon Prime Day lasts two whole … [+1782 chars]
